docs.snippet: GENEVA -- I have just learned that a friend, Stephanos Pandelakis, a Greek pediatrician, has been tortured. For nine days after his arrest in Athens in April, no one knew where he was. He was alternately kept in a dark hole and beaten, which he was...
docs.lead_paragraph: GENEVA -- I have just learned that a friend, Stephanos Pandelakis, a Greek pediatrician, has been tortured. For nine days after his arrest in Athens in April, no one knew where he was. He was alternately kept in a dark hole and beaten, which he was able to stand, and then tortured with electricity which he was not able to stand.
docs.abstract: J Becket article charging torture as an instrument of govt is widespread and condemning practice; cartoon

docs.snippet: SANTIAGO, Chile, Aug. 6 -- The flow of cocaine from Chile to the United States is reported by agents of the United States Bureau of Narcotics and Dangerous Drugs and Chilean officials to be at record levels. The agents were interviewed in neighboring...
docs.lead_paragraph: SANTIAGO, Chile, Aug. 6 -- The flow of cocaine from Chile to the United States is reported by agents of the United States Bureau of Narcotics and Dangerous Drugs and Chilean officials to be at record levels. The agents were interviewed in neighboring countries.
docs.abstract: agents of US Bur of Narcotics and Dangerous Drugs rept on Aug 6 that flow of cocaine from Chile to US has reached record levels; Chile is reptdly leading source of cocaine being smuggled into US

headline.main: CHILEAN COCAINE INCREASES IN U.S.; Inflow From Santiago Said to Include More Heroin

docs.snippet: AN announcement by the Postal Service indicates further expansion plans for sets of stamps instead of singles. Postmaster General E. T. Klassen said that in 1973 there will be a 4-stamp American Arts series for authors, poets, composers and artists....
docs.lead_paragraph: AN announcement by the Postal Service indicates further expansion plans for sets of stamps instead of singles. Postmaster General E. T. Klassen said that in 1973 there will be a 4-stamp American Arts series for authors, poets, composers and artists. Two of the stamps will pay homage to George Gershwin, the composer, and Willa Cather, the novelist. The poet and artist are to be selected.
docs.abstract: UN to issue stamp Sept 11 marking ECE 25th anniv; stamp illus

docs.snippet: MUNICH, West Germany, Aug. 25 -- Having hopefully dispensed with politics, the Olympics will turn toward pomp and pageantry tomorrow for the ceremonies that will officially open the 20th Games.
docs.lead_paragraph: MUNICH, West Germany, Aug. 25 -- Having hopefully dispensed with politics, the Olympics will turn toward pomp and pageantry tomorrow for the ceremonies that will officially open the 20th Games.

headline.main: Olympians March to Softer Drum Today; OLYMPICS TO OPEN ON LOW KEY TODAY
